data.Sentence_cn: 傍晚时分，孩子们在田野中央搭起了帐篷。
data.Sentence: Late in the afternoon, the boys put up their tent in the middle of a field.

data.Sentence_cn: 这件事刚刚做完，他们就在篝火上烧起了饭。
data.Sentence: As soon as this was done, they cooked a meal over an open fire.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们全都饿了，饭菜散发出阵阵香味。
data.Sentence: They were all hungry and the food smelled good.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们美美地吃了一顿饭后，就围在营火旁讲起了故事，唱起了歌。
data.Sentence: After a wonderful meal, they told stories and sang songs by the campfire.

data.Sentence_cn: 但过了一阵子。天下起雨来，
data.Sentence: But some time later it began to rain.

data.Sentence_cn: 于是他们扑灭了篝火，钻进了帐篷。
data.Sentence: The boys felt tired so they put out the fire and crept into their tent.

data.Sentence_cn: 睡袋既暖和又舒服，所以，他们都睡得很香。
data.Sentence: Their sleeping bags were warm and comfortable, so they all slept soundly.

data.Sentence_cn: 午夜前后，有两个孩子醒了，大声叫了起来。
data.Sentence: In the middle of the night, two boys woke up and began shouting.

data.Sentence_cn: 原来帐篷里到处都是水！
data.Sentence: The tent was full of water!

data.Sentence_cn: 他们全都跳出睡袋，跑到外面。
data.Sentence: They all leapt out of their sleeping bags and hurried outside.

data.Sentence_cn: 雨下得很大，他们发现地上已经形成了一条小溪。
data.Sentence: It was raining heavily and they found that a stream had formed in the field.

data.Sentence_cn: 那小溪弯弯曲曲穿过田野，然后正好从他们的帐篷底下流过去！
data.Sentence: The stream wound its way across the field and then flowed right under their tent!
